text: Admission is an American romantic comedy-drama movie about life in college. It was released in 2013. Tina Fey acts as Portia and Lily Tomlin acts as Susannah in this movie. ==References== == Other websites == * * * * Category:2013 comedy-drama movies Category:2013 romantic comedy movies Category:2013 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Infidelity in movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in universities and colleges Category:Princeton University
title: Admission (movie)
